casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Pilgrim, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Pilgrim (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 619.]

(No. 98-497 Submitted August 25, 1999 Decided September 29, 1999.) P. Eugene Long II, Pickaway County Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Hughes (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 424, 715 N.E.2d 540.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents. Lundberg Stratton, J.,

dissenting. I respectfully dissent from the majority’s judgment for the reasons set forth in my dissent in State v. Hughes (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 424, 715 N.E.2d 540.
